reviews.review: fuck legion and doctor

Um jogo que parece simples, mas possui sua complexidade. Além do básico, fazer 5 geradores, abrir um ou os dois portões, em equipe de quatro sobreviventes e nesse meio tempo, escapar do killer enquanto usa estratégias de perseguição, usando as perks que se adequam melhor para a sua jogada e aprendendo a utilizar os mapas da melhor forma possível. Ainda estou aprendendo, mesmo com mais de 500 horas de jogo! E, ainda assim, gosto de jogar sempre. Os maiores problemas são os pequenos bugs, que ainda estão sempre consertando, e uma parte da comunidade que pode ser bem tóxica. Eu, particularmente, não me importo muito, mas isso não deixa de ser desnecessário. Para mim, vale a pena a compra do jogo e das suas DLCs, onde cada killer possui um poder único, e cada sobrevivente possui três perks únicas e ensináveis aos outros, onde torna o jogo, mesmo assimétrico, ainda mais interessante a cada partida.

I hate this game so much. The game overall favors controllers over mouse / keyboard. The responsiveness to make turns can sometimes evade killer attacks / cause missed swings on survivors. The community is toxic. The game favors experience players--those who are familiar with the maps. If you know the map well enough, you can loops killers or killers know shortcuts. 

It's also all about working the camera, to see where the other person is, sometimes using slats in the wood walls to catch tiny glimpses. Most maps are dark, so it's hard to see everyone anyway. Claudette blends in too well with the terrain. Also, more maps need to be released. Too many DLCs for cash grabs for this game.

The game is also incredibly buggy. Various visual issues like (i.e.appearing as if you're hooked after getting hit, survivor hair glitching, etc) and connectivity issues (get bounced out of a lobby or appearing in a lobby with friends but not entering a match lobby with friends, continuous errors for miscellaneous reasons that prevent connecting to survivor party, etc).

When boiled down to it's essence, it's not about rewarding players with a fun tag / hide and seek experience, it's about griefing others. Again, I hate this game, I hate the toxic community, and I hate the devs for their laziness.

Gry na moment obecny nie da się polecić ani nie opłaca jej się kupować.

Since the bible itself had been written, many worshippers of chaos have needed a way to hunt down your friends from all over the globe (for example New Zealand) without getting imprisoned by the hand of the law. Dead by daylight has given us this very ability. Until my days are done i will be murdering my friends with knifes or in the hags case slapping the MCshit outta my so called "friends". Can you honestly say you don't want in on that?

Now is see what you may have to say against that: "but i can kill people in Conan Exiles why would i need to do that in another game?". Well if you said that no, your wrong, in fact your a fucking idiot.

Now i see what you may say in response "no your an idiot!". well i see where you coming from but no your still wrong you little shit.

If you still disagree then i hope someone HEX: Ruin's your life.

Thank you for your time you filthy degenerate.

Now do you have a moment to talk about our lord and saviour: The Entity?

Fun game. Though I think there needs to be more incentive to play killer since I've spent about 10 minutes in the queue for survivor multiple times before giving up and am yet to be bother to wait longer... Though I really enjoy playing Killer so not that big a deal. 

There are lots of mechanics to the game which take a while, and are taking a while, to get used to but it's all part of the learning curve which most games don't have, which isn't necessarily a bad thing since most games once you've played for 30 minutes, you've done all you're ever going to do on it.

Éste video juego me hizo retomar la pasión por por los video games, ya que me encanta el sigilo o el estrés y adrenalina qué descargas cuando te pilla el killer, además no hacen un juego cada año para exprimir nuestro dinero, sino que van haciendo mejoras constantes para mejorar nuestra experiencing y así unificar a la comunidad DBD, sólo espero que el cross progression incluya todas las consolas y no sólo algunas.

1850 horas de jogo e n roda no meu pc =D. Mas falando sério, pra mim o maior issue desse jogo é a otimização. se tiver um dos pc humilde nem tenta. além de que o jogo n é mt "amigável" pra iniciantes, mas eu n acho q seja um GRANDE problema, basta jogar com 1 amigo que sua vida fica 50% mais divertida.
Podem ter uma cacetada de coisas desbalanceadas, chatas, ou até bugs no jogo. No começo é chatissimo enfrentar tudo isso, mas acostuma com o tempo.
E pq q eu tenho 1800 horas de jogo ent? bem, mesmo tendo todos esses problemas e a criadora do jogo sendo meio preguiçosa as vezes, o jogo é muito bom!
É viciante pra cacete jogar esse jogo, tanto de killer quanto de survivor. é uma gama de possibilidades que vc pode explorar nesse game, conteúdo tem de sobra. E uma quantidade quase infinita de desafios e estratégias que vc pode fazer e melhorar no jogo faz parte disso.
Mas se prepare, pois é uma jornada árdua jogar dentro das regras do reino da entidade.

工匠太强了现在，路人局根本修不了机子了现在。     
建议设置成与场上现存者数量来规定。 防止“工匠”对于生存者残局影响过大的情况出现。   
例如：
 当场上存在4/3/2/1位幸存者时，工匠会在电机被修理70%/75%/80%/90%时 触发。

เกมนี้คือเกมที่สมดุลถ้าคุณกดมาคนเดียวหมด แต่ถ้าเจอเซอร์กดมาด้วยกัน พร้อมมีดิสคอร์ด ฆาตกรที่ของจริงเท่านั้นถึงจะเอาลง อะไรต่างๆมากมายก็ค่อนข้างจะอัพเดทกว่าเมื่อก่อนเยอะแล้ว ไอพวกที่บอกว่าฆาตกรเดินเร็ว คุณลองเล่นฆาตกรดูครับแล้วจะรู้ว่ามันไม่ได้เร็วอย่างที่คิด ไอพวกที่บอกว่าเซอร์ปั่นช้า คุณลองเล่นฆาตกรดูครับว่ามันไม่ได้ช้าเลย ไอพวกที่บอกว่าฆาตกรเฝ้า จบตานั้นเค้าก็ฆ่าได้แค่คนเดียว แรงค์ไม่มีทางเพิ่ม ไม่มีทางฆ่าได้มากกว่า 2 ถ้าคุณไม่ได้เข้าไปตายทีละคน

这个游戏治疗低血压有特效！
首先是服务器和网络，排日服还好，到了韩服真的是想骂人。素质问题不谈，延迟导致的隔空刀气和回血板相信每个人都经历过。还有就是眼睁睁看着手伸出去抓人的动画出来了，下一秒人跑了无事发生。BE就不能还我们一个能玩的国服么？
其次是多到令人发指的bug，踢不了板都是小问题，什么打到一半直接掉线，火图腾刷在够不到的地方，抱人卡住放不下来，进灵界听不见声音等等。特别这次钉子头一堆bug都敢直接拿出来卖，合着测试服到底测了个啥？
最后是有毒的玩家社区和外挂问题，单边屠夫被钢铁车队蹲起手电加1212，单排人类给组队玩家打工花式被卖。积怨已久的结果是视频里但凡有点守尸或者嘲讽评论区就开始对骂。还有的缺德玩家直接开挂飞天遁地秒修秒摸等等官方更是不作为不治理。
现状就是屠夫秒排，人类排半天屠夫还不一定接单，看见是高配车队可能直接就返回大厅。虽然说这大概是非对称竞技游戏难免会有的问题，但还是希望BE能多干点事情好好改善一下游戏环境，不然被气到删游戏的玩家只会越来越多。
